bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XXVIII. Italy IX. Published by Robert Marichal, Jan-Olof Tjäder, Guglielmo Cavallo and Francesco Magistrale.
bibl.note: Ch.L.A. XXVIII, 839-865. - En part.: Genova, Università degli Studi; - Milano, Università Cattolica del Sacro Cuore; - Trieste, Università di Trieste.

Bruckner Albert † and Robert Marichal, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XXVIII. Italy IX. Published by Robert Marichal, Jan-Olof Tjäder, Guglielmo Cavallo and Francesco Magistrale.
Dietikon - Zürich, Urs Graf Verlag, 1988, in fol., viii-96 pp., ill.
